name: Bull In A China Shop (Second Quest Games, MrFunkyland, Tiny Moon Studios, Yoghurt Dip, Zhou-Enxuan)
name_original: Bull In A China Shop (Second Quest Games, MrFunkyland, Tiny Moon Studios, Yoghurt Dip, Zhou-Enxuan)
description:
You're a wild bull on the loose and your entire mission is to DESTROY AND WREAK HAVOC!

Smash as many things as you can and drive up the costs! What's your highest invoice going to be?

(Note: sorry for the long load time! We ran out of time to troubleshoot before the deadline)

(Note 2: If you liked the music and SFX, check out the other tracks made by the very talented mrfunkyland over on his Soundcloud)

Controls:

- Lead the bull with the mouse cursor

- Left click to dash

Features:

- Satisfying physics based gameplay.  Who doesn't love a good smashing?!

- Simple, intuitive movement

- Designed lean & mean to run as smoothly as possible on most machines
